Item.Data: <RuleCollection Type="EXE" EnforcementMode="Enabled"><FilePathRule Id="10a81333-60a0-4e3b-b0f6-b52e454d4087" Name="Default_Allow_*" Description="Allow All" UserOrGroupSid="S-1-1-0" Action="Allow"><Conditions><FilePathCondition Path="*"/></Conditions></FilePathRule><FilePublisherRule Id="6a3d3027-7233-41b5-a8f4-289884c2e99a" Name="EDP-notepad_Deny_NOTEPAD.EXE_MICROSOFT速 WINDOWS速 OPERATING SYSTEM_*" Description="Notepad" UserOrGroupSid="S-1-1-0" Action="Deny"><Conditions><FilePublisherCondition PublisherName="*" ProductName="MICROSOFT速 WINDOWS速 OPERATING SYSTEM" BinaryName="NOTEPAD.EXE"><BinaryVersionRange LowSection="*" HighSection="*"/></FilePublisherCondition></Conditions></FilePublisherRule></RuleCollection>

<RuleCollection Type="Appx" EnforcementMode="Enabled"><FilePublisherRule Id="564b41b6-5f21-4818-a932-ca56675f11bf" Name="Default_Allow_*_*_*" Description="Allow All" UserOrGroupSid="S-1-1-0" Action="Allow"><Conditions><FilePublisherCondition PublisherName="*" ProductName="*" BinaryName="*"><BinaryVersionRange LowSection="*" HighSection="*"/></FilePublisherCondition></Conditions></FilePublisherRule></RuleCollection>
